synopsis: Relentlessly hardworking SpongeBob SquarePants, lives in the undersea township of Bikini Bottom. Among him is his friends, Patrick, Squidward, and Sandy. SpongeBob is employed as a fry cook at the local burger place, the Krusty Krab, which is operated by a crustacean named Mr. Krabs. But recently new groups of evil have emerged, all trying to steal the secret formula. From Goo Lagoon to Jelly Fish Fields, watch SpongeBob, Squidward, and Sandy, battle it out in a bid for peace at the Krusty Krab, and in Bikini Bottom. (Source: IMDB)
